description: a(0) = 0; for n > 0, if n appears in the sequence then a(n) = a(n-1) - lastindex(n) if nonnegative and not already in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) + lastindex(n), where lastindex(n) is the index of the last appearance of n. Otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) - n if nonnegative and not already in the sequence, otherwise a(n) = a(n-1) + n.
